name: To Keep the Meat
description:
Your name is Xavier Mertz, and your companion has just fallen into a glacier.

A short (15-30 min) piece of interactive fiction based on the end of the 1911 Mawson Expedition to Antarctica. This game blends the true facts of the expedition with rumor and fiction of my own making; I do not claim any of the following is true.

For best play experience, full screen is recommended. This game is mobile-friendly.

Content warnings: human and dog death, starvation, illness, discussion of cannibalism
